faqs.question: Does lakeside living cause more septic repairs in Granbury?
faqs.answer: Properties near Lake Granbury can experience higher water table effects that stress components. Seasonal lake level changes and heavy rain events can saturate drain fields. faqs.question: Can shallow limestone complicate Granbury septic repairs?
faqs.answer: Yes. Some Hood County properties have limestone bedrock near the surface that limits excavation options. Repairs may require specialized equipment or alternative approaches like engineered fill. Our technicians have experience working with Granbury's limestone conditions.
